org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client

Class NodeClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbib.elasticsearch.support.client.NodeClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DocumentIngest

    public class NodeClient
extends Object
implements DocumentIngest
    Node client support. Implements minimal API for node client ingesting. Useful for river implementations.
